content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone Furnace Array at position (1, 1) and (3, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace at position (1.0, 1.0) with fuel from inventory and processing iron ore into iron plates.
- Stone furnace at position (3.0, 0.0) with fuel from inventory and processing iron ore into iron plates.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure that the furnaces have enough space and the correct items available before inserting. 

### Errors when extracting items from furnaces
- Make sure to extract items only when the furnaces have produced the desired output. 

### Errors when using stale entity data
- Regularly check the status of entities on the map to ensure that you are working with up-to-date information. If entities are stale, consider refreshing or reloading the data. 

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.
